title: Manual Document Entry Prompts
author: Rashid Azarang
summary: Overview of the manual document entry prompts used in the recursive publishing workflow

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: This directory contains the prompt documents that guide the process of manually adding entries to the Cognitive Infrastructure knowledge base. These prompts define a systematic workflow for transforming raw ideas and manuscripts into properly structured canonical entries.

sections.title: The Recursive Publishing Workflow
sections.content:
1. **Step 1: Epistemic Extraction** - Extract core concepts, patterns, and other epistemic assets from unstructured manuscripts
2. **Step 2: Canonical Entry Generation** - Transform extracted units into structured markdown entries
3. **Step 3: Upsert Pending Documents** - Process, validate, and integrate draft documents into the canonical knowledge base
4. **Step 4: Cross-Referencing Pass** - Establish semantic relationships and bidirectional links between concepts

sections.title: Usage
sections.content: These prompts are designed to be used sequentially as part of the publishing workflow. Each step builds on the previous one, creating a pipeline for knowledge integration and refinement.
